statements: SELECT * FROM EducationalOpportunities;
SELECT opportunity_name, organization_name, location FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_name, start_date, end_date FROM EducationalOpportunities ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT organization_name, location FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT opportunity_name, organization_name, location FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT organization_name FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY organization_name;
SELECT opportunity_name, start_date, end_date FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE status = 'inactive' AND organization_name LIKE 'Tech%';
SELECT opportunity_name, location, status FROM EducationalOpportunities WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY location, status DESC;
SELECT * FROM Opportunities;
SELECT opportunity_name, provider_name, start_date, end_date FROM Opportunities;
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_name, location FROM Opportunities WHERE provider_name = 'XYZ Company';
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT full_name, age, nationality FROM Participants WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT * FROM Opportunities WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT opportunity_name, provider_name, start_date, end_date FROM Opportunities WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT full_name, age, gender, education_level FROM Participants WHERE age > 25 AND nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT opportunity_name, provider_name, location FROM Opportunities WHERE opportunity_type = 'Workshop' AND location IN ('London', 'Paris');
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor' AND opportunity_id IN (SELECT opportunity_id FROM Opportunities WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Corp');
SELECT * FROM recordings;
SELECT title, description FROM educational_opportunities WHERE location='New York';
SELECT recording_id, title, date_recorded FROM recordings ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_records WHERE opportunity_id=1;
SELECT title, organization, start_date, end_date FROM educational_opportunities WHERE organization='ABC Inc.';
SELECT recording_id, title, description FROM recordings;
SELECT * FROM educational_opportunities WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, location FROM educational_opportunities ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT recordings.recording_id, recordings.title, educational_opportunities.title AS opportunity_title FROM recordings JOIN educational_opportunities ON recordings.recording_id = educational_opportunities.opportunity_id;
SELECT * FROM tracking_records WHERE date_tracked BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM opportunities;
SELECT opportunity_name, location, start_date FROM opportunities WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, contact_email FROM participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;

SELECT registration_id, opportunity_name, participant_name, registration_date FROM registrations JOIN opportunities ON registrations.opportunity_id = opportunities.opportunity_id JOIN participants ON registrations.participant_id = participants.participant_id;
SELECT progress_status, progress_date FROM progress_tracking WHERE tracking_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM opportunities;
SELECT opportunity_name, location, start_date, is_active FROM opportunities WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, contact_email FROM participants WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT opportunity_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM opportunities WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT p.participant_name, o.opportunity_name, r.registration_date FROM participants p INNER JOIN registrations r ON p.participant_id = r.participant_id INNER JOIN opportunities o ON r.opportunity_id = o.opportunity_id WHERE p.participant_age >= 18 AND r.registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Referral;
SELECT referral_id, referral_date, referral_type FROM Referral ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT organization_name, opportunity_title FROM Opportunity WHERE opportunity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_nationality FROM Participant WHERE participant_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Enrollment INNER JOIN Opportunity ON Enrollment.opportunity_id = Opportunity.opportunity_id WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Referral ORDER BY referral_date DESC;
SELECT opportunity_title, organization_name, opportunity_description FROM Opportunity WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender, participant_age FROM Participant WHERE participant_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY participant_age ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM Enrollment WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';

SELECT opportunity_title, organization_name, enrollment_date, enrollment_status FROM Opportunity JOIN Enrollment ON Opportunity.opportunity_id = Enrollment.opportunity_id WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
